edited_stories.edited_story_text: Today was the first day of the graduation ceremony, held during a full moon.  The stadium was packed with graduates, parents, and friends . There were a lot of people there to celebrate with the graduates.  They were very proud of their accomplishments. The crowd was very excited  when the balloons were released at the end of the ceremony.
